New Nodes In New Parts Of The World

The ThreeFold Grid is growing steadily.

Sam Taggart

28 May 2021

This month, we had new nodes come online in Brazil, Cyprus, the United Kingdom, Belgium, Romania, the United States, Italy, Bulgaria, and more. Welcome to our new farmers!

If you're a farmer or if you're interested in farming and have some questions, please join our farmers chat here.

And you can always explore live grid stats – total capacity, locations, and much more – via our grid explorer

threefold_grid

Grid V2 to V3 Migration Update

Since we are now live on TF Grid 3.0, it is important that all farmers who are still on Grid 2.x migrate their farms to the newest mainnet.

Grid 2.7 is Live on Testnet

Last week we announced Grid 2.6 live on testnet, and a week later here we are announcing Grid 2.7!

SLOGAN
